thread.title: Breaking up TSB and Williams and Glyn has not worked
thread.title_full: Breaking up TSB and Williams and Glyn has not worked

author: Tim Wallace
title: Breaking up TSB and Williams and Glyn has not worked
text: Banks and Finance Breaking up TSB and Williams and Glyn has not worked Carving the new banks out of Lloyds and RBS has failed to boost competition, according to the Competition and Markets Authority TSB's chief Paul Pester might be proud of the bank's performance, but the CMA argues that carving the bank out of Lloyds may not have been the best way to promote competition in the sector Photo: PA
